inclusion.criterion: Chronic hepatitis C documented by a detectable HCV RNA level by a PCR performed within 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy performed within 3 years or fibro test/fibroscan within 1 year
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Compensated cirrhosis hepatitis C liver disease (Child-Pugh ≤ 6)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient needing, according to the physician, the initiation of a combined therapy of pegylated interferon alfa plus Ribavirin
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy

inclusion.criterion: Negative HBsAg test and HIV-Elisa test
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test at baseline in women in age of procreation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Efficient contraception all along the treatment period, and for 6 months after discontinuation of the treatment for women and men
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cirrhotic patients, HBV/HIV co-infection, evidence of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC), significant evolutive cardiovascular, pulmonary, renal or psychiatric disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy/breast feeding or patients post liver transplantation and anemia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant and evolutive cardiovascular, pulmonary, severe psychiatric disorder or renal dysfunction (calculated creatinine CL < 50 ml/min)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recent history of epilepsy (less than 6 months)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, is on combination therapy and meets most inclusion criteria. However, there are some unknowns regarding compensated cirrhosis and renal function.
